tutorial.selecionar_tipo_unidade: Here you can select each unit type individually.
tutorial.bem_vindo: Welcome to the SmartApSUS Tutorial! Let’s explore the interactive map.
tutorial.regioes_brasil: Here you can see Brazil’s different regions highlighted on the map.
tutorial.explorar_estados: To explore states within a region, **double-click** on the map. Let’s start with the Northeast region.
tutorial.regiao_nordeste: This is the Northeast region. Here you can explore more details of each state in this region.
tutorial.estado_pernambuco: For example, by *clicking once* on Pernambuco, we can view its data.
tutorial.exemplo_pernambuco: Continuing with Pernambuco, you can explore its municipalities by **double-clicking** on it.
tutorial.municipios_pernambuco: Now you can see Pernambuco’s municipalities. Clicking a municipality shows its related data.
tutorial.municipio_recife: For example, click on Recife to see more detailed information.
tutorial.painel_configuracoes: Before we discuss unit selection, note you can open or close the settings panel (modal). Click the button below to open it.
tutorial.multi_select: Now, with the modal open, let’s learn how to multi-select APS Unit Types within Recife.
tutorial.tipo_unidades_aps: You can select all APS Unit Types at once by clicking 'Select All', or choose individual units like Basic Health Unit, Polyclinic, or Hospital.
tutorial.popup_unidade: Now, when you click a marker on the map, a popup will appear with detailed unit information. Let’s demonstrate by automatically opening Hospital C’s popup.
tutorial.agradecimento: Thank you for participating in the tutorial!
tutorial.selecionar_regiao: Select a region to view units.

components.mapa_instrucoes1: Click the draw button in the top-right corner of the map to start demarcating an area.
components.mapa_instrucoes2: To draw a polygon, click successive points on the map to create the vertices of your area.
components.mapa_instrucoes3: Finish drawing by clicking the first point again or double-click to close the shape automatically.
components.cep_invalido: Invalid ZIP code or lookup error
components.cep_invalido2: Error fetching address. Invalid ZIP code.
components.mapa_1: A double-click on the map adds or moves the APS unit marker to the desired location.
components.mapa_2: You can also move the marker by clicking and dragging it to the new location.
components.nenhum_dado_atendimento: No visit data available to display the chart.
components.selecione_regiao_unidades: Select a region to view the units.
components.historico_atendimentos: Visit History by APS Unit (Including Estimate)
components.area_vermelha: The red area and red dots indicate estimated values.
components.descricao_remover_do_grafico1: Click the APS unit name with [x] to remove it from the chart
components.descricao_remover_do_grafico2: Click the city name with [x] to remove it from the chart
components.placeholder_digite_selecione_unidade: Type or select an APS unit...
components.nenhum_dado_exibir_grafico: No data available to display the chart.
components.lista_unidades_fora_municipio: The following units are outside municipality boundaries:
components.titulo_atendimentos_media_estadual_nacio: Visits (APS Unit vs. State and National Averages)
components.selecione_tipos_unidades_exibidos: Select APS unit types to display:
components.comecar_desenho: Click to start drawing the neighborhood area
components.continuar_desenho: Click to continue drawing the neighborhood area
components.fechar_area: Click the first point to close the demarcated area
components.arraste_para_alterar: Drag the handles to modify the demarcated area
components.clique_para_remover: Click an area to remove it, then click Save.
components.erro_area_fora_limites: The drawn area is completely outside municipality limits
components.erro_area_nao_definida_cidade: Error: No area defined for the city.
components.metric_weights_soma_peso: The sum of weights must be 100% (currently: {{total}}%)
components.metric_weights_descricao: Assign weights to metrics (sum must be 100%)

otimizacaoProfissionaisDetalhesId.distribuicaoProfissionais: Distribution of professionals by health unit
otimizacaoProfissionaisDetalhesId.clicarOtimizar: By clicking 'Optimize', the process will start in the background and you can monitor its progress on the optimization screen.
otimizacaoProfissionaisDetalhesId.bemVindo: Welcome to the health professionals optimization tool. Here, you can view and analyze the distribution of professionals across different health units based on criteria such as state, municipality, unit type, and specialty. By entering this information, the algorithm will process the data and display on the map the current number of professionals in each unit, as well as an optimized projection after analysis. This allows strategic decisions to improve professional allocation and ensure more efficient care for the population.
